description:
In this NLP-based program I will reveal the time-tested goal setting strategies that have greatly impacted successful people from all walks of life.  NLP Well-Formed Outcomes will guide you in achieving your aspirations with minimal friction.  As you utilize this world-renowned Goal Setting Strategy, you will eliminate "Muddy Thinking" and gain detailed clarity over what's most important to you.  

This system has been acclaimed for helping millions move past ordinary results, and achieve outcomes that are directly aligned with their best possible selves.  The course will enable you to develop a compelling future that increases your flow of effort by ensuring that your goals are self-concordant.

As you use the NLP Goal Setting System I'm confident that you will avoid common pitfalls, and further your success in the things that are most important to you.

This course teaches how to set NLP Well-Formed Outcomes and presents much of the material in an indexed format so that you can easily review the strategy whenever necessary.
title: NLP: Goal Setting Criteria for Achieving the Life You Want
instructors: NLP, Positive Psychology Coach Patrick Howell
